full_summary:
**Solicitation Number:** T8493-230078/A
**Title:** Spare Tube Assembly for Bell 429 Aircraft
There is a procurement opportunity available for the acquisition of a spare tube assembly for the Bell 429 aircraft.

**Procurement Details:**
* Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Category: SRVTGD
* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* End-User Entity: Transport Canada
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

**Proposal Instructions:**

Only qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) holders for the T8493-140035 series will be considered. Suppliers on this list or those able to meet qualification requirements may submit a proposal. The proposal documents will be emailed directly by the contracting officer to qualified vendors.

**Proposal Evaluation Criteria:**
Bidders will be evaluated based on a best overall proposal, with a comprehensive assessment of technical merit and price.

**Proposal Submission:**
Proposal documents will be distributed electronically to qualified vendors. Bidders are advised that the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of these documents.

**Contact Information:**

Valérie Bourassa, Contracting Officer
Public Works and Government Services Canada
11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Phone: (873) 455-0980
Email: [valerie.bourassa@tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:valerie.bourassa@tpsgc.gc.ca)

**Supplier Qualification:**
A notice will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the T8493-140035 series. Interested suppliers should contact Oliver Morones at Public Works and Government Services Canada for more information.

**Important Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: January 24, 2024
* Deliverable Date: January 24, 2024

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Please note that the text has been condensed and reformatted for clarity and readability.

Please format your response in nice markdown format. Only include relevant information and avoid unnecessary wording.

Please let me know if 400 words includes attachments or any additional materials. Assuming no. Only the rewritten text is to be provided. 

Feedback is appreciated in case you see room for improvement. Can you point out areas that can be enhanced?
Feedback is appreciated
